a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Drivers of forest loss in the Brazilian Amazon
Annual forest loss includes permanent conversion of forest to other land uses (deforestation) and temporary
forest loss (degradation). This is measured in hectares.
Data source: Tyukavina et al. (2017). Types and rates of forest disturbance in Brazilian Legal Amazon, 2000–2013. Science.
